properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v11

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Earth's creator,
everyday God,
Loving Maker,
O Jesus,
you who shaped us,
O Spirit,
recreate us,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In your presence,
everyday God,
we are gathered,
O Jesus,
you have called us,
O Spirit,
to restore us,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Life of all lives,
everyday God,
love of all loves,
O Jesus,
hope of all hopes,
O Spirit,
light of all lights,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
In our resting,
everyday God,
in our rising,
O Jesus,
in our hoping,
O Spirit,
in our waiting,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
In our dreaming,
everyday God,
in our daring,
O Jesus,
in our searching,
O Spirit,
in our sharing,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
God of laughter,
everyday God,
God of sorrow,
O Jesus,
home and shelter,
O Spirit,
strong and patient,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Way of freedom,
everyday God,
star of morning,
O Jesus,
timeless healer,
O Spirit,
flame eternal,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Word of gladness,
everyday God,
word of mercy,
O Jesus,
word of friendship,
O Spirit,
word of challenge,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Gentle father,
everyday God,
faithful brother,
O Jesus,
tender sister,
O Spirit,
loving mother,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Our beginning,
everyday God,
our unfolding,
O Jesus,
our enduring,
O Spirit,
journey's ending,
come, be with us.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Alleluia,
everyday God,
now and always,
O Jesus,
alleluia,
O Spirit,
through all ages,
come, be with us.
